synopsis.text: Waking up lost and alone in a strange virtual world, Hakuno Kishinami finds himself forced to fight for his life in a war he doesn't understand. With no memories and only a mysterious Servant by his side, Hakuno must face deadly battles if he hopes to uncover the secrets of his past and the purpose of the Holy Grail he's meant to win. But dangers await in this forgotten realm - can Hakuno survive long enough to learn the truth, or will he lose himself in the process?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
